text: The men's 3000 metres steeplechase event at the 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Annecy, France, at Parc des Sports on 30 July and 1 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Reuben Kosgei ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Abraham Cherono ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Mustapha Mellouk ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 1 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
